ARTICLE.TITLE: Serafima Meshaka: Murder of Russian woman ‘investigated at state level’
ARTICLE.TEXT:
The husband of a wealthy Russian woman found murdered in her flat has said that her death is being discussed at “state level”.

Serafima Meshaka, 58, was found dead from head injuries at her flat in Ealing, west London, last Wednesday by a police officer responding to concerns for her welfare.

Scotland Yard said that Mrs Meshaka had been attacked and has opened a murder investigation after a post-mortem examination on Monday.

Her husband, Michel Meshaka, 87, told the Daily Mail: “It has gone beyond the highest level imaginable. It’s because my wife was very well known and she was known within high circles.

“It is being dealt with by police at the top, top level. This is a serious matter not only within
